channel.title: CVE Feed for Creative Solutions -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Creative Solutions -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-37988|2024-08-02T17:23:27.814Z -- creative%20solutions -- contact%20form%20generator
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Creative Solutions Contact Form Generator plugin <= 2.5.5 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-35911|2024-08-02T16:37:40.027Z -- creative%20solutions -- contact%20form%20generator%20%3A%20creative%20form%20builder%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Creative Solutions Contact Form Generator : Creative form builder for WordPress allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Contact Form Generator : Creative form builder for WordPress: from n/a through 2.6.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-30447|2024-06-06T19:22:08.936Z -- creative%20solutions -- creative%20image%20slider%20%E2%80%93%20responsive%20slider%20plugin
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Creative Solutions Creative Image Slider – Responsive Slider Plugin allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Creative Image Slider – Responsive Slider Plugin: from n/a through 2.1.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-30447|2024-08-02T01:32:07.351Z -- creative%20solutions -- creative%20image%20slider%20%E2%80%93%20responsive%20slider%20plugin
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Creative Solutions Creative Image Slider – Responsive Slider Plugin allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Creative Image Slider – Responsive Slider Plugin: from n/a through 2.1.3.
